response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to your endeavors, estimated at $1,500,000 to you. Our initial offer is structured to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product at a price of $1,200,000. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful partnership.", "product_price": 1200000}
